QSType.Description: (Required) Specifies whether the Quick Setup applies to the local account or an AWS organization.

QSConfigurationId.Description: (Required) Unique identifier of the deployed configuration.

QSGlobalResourcesRegion.Description: (Required) Name of the AWS Region to deploy global resources such as S3 buckets.

QSAttachConfigurationPolicy.Description: (Optional) Whether to attach Configuration permissions policy which sets boundaries of what configuration can do.

DelegatedAccountId.Description: (Optional) The account ID number of the member account in the organization to register as a delegated administrator.

RemediationSchedule.Description: (Optional) The interval at which the configuration's drift remediation runs.

CPackNames.Description: (Required) List of Conformance Packs to be installed. It should always contain 5 elements, use noValue as an empty choice

Content.description:
## AWS-DeployConformancePack

### What does this document do?

The **AWS-DeployConformancePack** automation document creates new or updates existing conformance packs in your current account or across member accounts in your AWS Organization.

### Inputs

- **ConformancePackName**: (Required) Name of the conformance pack you want to create.
- **TemplateSource**: "(Required) Location of the conformance pack template body. Format {\"Type\": \"S3|GitHub|TemplateBody\", \"Value\": \"URL|TemplateContent\"}."
- **ConformancePackInputParameters**: (Optional) A list of ConformancePackInputParameter objects.
- **DeployToOrganization**: (Optional) Identifies whether the specified conformance pack should be applied organization-wide.
- **ExcludedAccounts**: (Optional) A list of AWS accounts to be excluded from an organization conformance pack while deploying a conformance pack.
- **AutomationAssumeRole**: (Required) The ARN of the role that allows Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.

### Outputs

- **ConformancePackArn**: ARN of the created/updated conformance pack.

ConformancePackName.description: (Required) Name of the conformance pack you want to create.

TemplateSource.description: (Required) Location of the conformance pack template body. Format {"Type": "S3|GitHub|TemplateBody", "Value": "URL|TemplateContent"}.

DeployToOrganization.description: (Optional) Identifies whether the specified conformance pack should be applied organization-wide.

ExcludedAccounts.description: (Optional) A list of AWS accounts to be excluded from an organization conformance pack while deploying a conformance pack.

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Required) The ARN of the role that allows Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.
